attr.title: Lode
attr.desc: Explore by using the strange technology scattered throughout the world to change the way gravity affects you and your surroundings. Traverse every surface within reach, or use the room's gravity to move objects around. Features 64 x 64 pixel resolution and original chip tune sounds and music.
attr.desc_md:
Solve puzzles by manipulating gravity and make your way deeper. Can you reach the bottom and find a way to escape?

**Features**
- Explore by using the strange technology scattered throughout the world to change the way gravity affects you and your surroundings.
- Traverse every surface within reach, or use the room's gravity to move objects around.
- 64 x 64 pixel resolution and original chip tune sounds and music.
- 57 challenging levels to complete
attr.inst: Download game from https://fabledforgegames.itch.io/lode, place data.win in /ports/lode/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
1. Download the game from [Itch.io](https://fabledforgegames.itch.io/lode)
2. Extract the archive and locate the **data.win** file
3. Place the **data.win** file in the `/ports/lode/gamedata` directory on your device
4. Start the game from PortMaster
